title: What temperature should a Mac be at when playing?
body: I don't want my Mac to overheat, so what is the temperature of your guys's cpus while paying? I don't want to exceed the limit and risk damaging my laptop.

replies.body: I had to reach out to our techs for this kind of answer, and I was told "hot" xD! They mentioned that the materials most macs use tend to make them run a little hot, but for the best answer I'd try to find some temp monitoring software to see if it's running *too* hot.
